Posts.Content: I went thru same... Biafine was the cure and worked with my severest areas under fold of RAW areas where skin just melted off. I was told this happened because they used too many "Boosters," extra radiation tx during your regular time of tx. It takes a lon time to heal though, have tp be patient. Medciare would not pay for Biafine but a friend who worked for a Dermatologist gave me free samples to get me thru (7 boxes of small sample tubes and I used non stick gauze 3x3 pads on top with tape. Judi

Posts.Content: I had radiation tx and ended up with severe burns, rash, and horrific 3 1/2x3 1/2" raw skin between under breast and stomach it lays on(DD). I have tried Silver S. and all kinds of contraptions not usinf tape it will tear my skin. Any suggestions? Thanks, Judi M.
